q: New York. To learn of six people killed and 14 others shot at such an event-- including her close friend Gabrielle Giffords -- was tough for Kirsten Gillibrand . ''It has been devastating,'' she said. I haven't had a more difficult week in my life, really. No one this close to me, as an adult, has been this close to being lost. Still, she is not perturbed for her own safety-- although her husband, Jonathan, always is, at least some. ''Of course he worries about me every day, and he

, panel newcomers Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler see themselves more as merchants of mentoring than of menace. ''We bring a different perspective... especially if you're speaking about Simon Cowell ,'' Jennifer Lopez said. We're artists. We've been up there. We've auditioned. We've been through the ranks. That's what we're there for-- to help the kids either move on to the next level or break the news to them that they're not going on to the next level. to Be Rude, But...'' in which he laid down five important principles that actors can use when auditioning. 1. Don't grovel when you come in. Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2.
